Posts.EditableText: [quote:1nrswtns]I'm playing Apocamophosis. i can't for the life of me figure out howto "use Lab key on south door". so forums. here I come. can you help?[/quote:1nrswtns] If the email didn't solve your problem, I'll check out the item to make sure it's working properly [u:1nrswtns]UPDATE[/u:1nrswtns]: So I checked out the "Lab Key" and tried it in the game and it works perfectly. Remember you have to be in the right area to use the keys or they won't work. For the Lab Key you have to be in the Hallway with the Locked Lab Door. Hope that helps! [quote:1nrswtns]I don't frequently see discussion here on porn games, but I'd assume the game feedback section might be place to ask, this board is generally for technical help for writers.[/quote:1nrswtns] In a few more updates it won't be an exclusive porn game. Weee!
Posts.HTML:
I'm playing Apocamophosis. i can't for the life of me figure out howto "use Lab key on south door". so forums. here I come. can you help?



If the email didn't solve your problem, I'll check out the item to make sure it's working properly

UPDATE:
So I checked out the "Lab Key" and tried it in the game and it works perfectly. Remember you have to be in the right area to use the keys or they won't work. For the Lab Key you have to be in the Hallway with the Locked Lab Door. Hope that helps!

I don't frequently see discussion here on porn games, but I'd assume the game feedback section might be place to ask, this board is generally for technical help for writers.



In a few more updates it won't be an exclusive porn game. Weee!
